title: The Enchanted Forest
description: In a land forgotten by time, an ancient curse has plunged the Enchanted Forest into eternal twilight. Enter the forest and unravel the mysteries that bind the land in darkness.

the-forest-queen.name: The Forest Queen
the-forest-queen.description: The wise and powerful ruler of the Enchanted Forest, seeking to end the curse that has befallen her realm.

FQ_A001.title: Nature's Wrath
FQ_A001.description: Unleashes the power of nature against enemies.

FQ_A003.title: Shield of Thorns
FQ_A003.description: Creates a protective barrier of thorns around allies.

FQ_A004.title: Summon Woodland Creatures
FQ_A004.description: Calls upon woodland creatures to assist in battle.

FQ_A005.title: Verdant Growth
FQ_A005.description: Causes rapid plant growth to entangle enemies.

FQ_A006.title: Gale Force
FQ_A006.description: Summons powerful winds to knock back foes.

FQ_A007.title: Soothing Rain
FQ_A007.description: Calls down a gentle rain that rejuvenates allies.

FQ_A008.title: Sunbeam
FQ_A008.description: Channels a focused beam of sunlight to blind and damage enemies.

FQ_A009.title: Roots of the Earth
FQ_A009.description: Causes roots to erupt from the ground, restraining enemies.

FQ_A010.title: Nature's Resilience
FQ_A010.description: Grants temporary invulnerability to an ally by surrounding them with natural energy.

FQ_A011.title: Nature's Wrath
FQ_A011.description: Unleashes the power of nature against enemies.

FQ_A012.title: Nature's Wrath

FQ_S003.title: Soothing Words
FQ_S003.description: Calms hostile emotions and fosters cooperation.

FQ_S004.title: Inspiring Speech
FQ_S004.description: Inspires allies to take bold actions.

FQ_S005.title: Royal Decree
FQ_S005.description: Issues a decree to influence an NPC's decisions.

FQ_S006.title: Noble Presence
FQ_S006.description: The Forest Queen's mere presence influences those around her.

FQ_S007.title: Binding Pact
FQ_S007.description: Forms a pact with an NPC for mutual benefit.

FQ_S008.title: Words of Wisdom
FQ_S008.description: Offers advice that steers the situation favorably.

FQ_S009.title: Charismatic Aura
FQ_S009.description: The Forest Queen's charisma sways opinions.

the-cursed-wanderer.name: The Cursed Wanderer
the-cursed-wanderer.description: A cursed being condemned to roam the forest as a beast for unknown reasons. They seek redemption and a way to break their curse.

CW_A001.title: Beastly Strength
CW_A001.description: Uses brute strength to overcome obstacles.

CW_A002.title: Primal Roar
CW_A002.description: Intimidates enemies with a powerful roar.

CW_A003.title: Savage Charge
CW_A003.description: Charges at enemies with unstoppable force.

CW_A004.title: Feral Leap
CW_A004.description: Leaps great distances to strike from above.

CW_A006.title: Dark Howl
CW_A006.description: Unleashes a terrifying howl to paralyze foes.

CW_A007.title: Unyielding Will
CW_A007.description: Pushes through pain and fatigue to keep fighting.

CW_A008.title: Fury Swipes
CW_A008.description: Delivers a rapid series of slashes.

CW_A009.title: Cursed Strike
CW_A009.description: A powerful strike infused with dark energy.

CW_A010.title: Beastly Strength
CW_A010.description: Uses brute strength to overcome obstacles.

CW_A011.title: Beastly Strength

CW_S001.title: Beast's Charm
CW_S001.description: Despite his appearance, he can be persuasive.

CW_S002.title: Silent Watcher
CW_S002.description: Observes and waits for the right moment to act.

CW_S003.title: Dark Presence
CW_S003.description: His cursed form exudes an aura that can intimidate others.

CW_S004.title: Guilt of the Past
CW_S004.description: Uses his tragic story to evoke sympathy.

CW_S005.title: Stalwart Defender
CW_S005.description: Stands up for others, earning their trust.

CW_S006.title: Beast's Intuition
CW_S006.description: Relies on instinct to navigate complex social situations.

CW_S007.title: Unseen Ally
CW_S007.description: Uses his ability to remain unnoticed to gather information.

CW_S008.title: Shadow's Embrace
CW_S008.description: Utilizes the darkness to his advantage in negotiations.

CW_S009.title: Beast's Wisdom
CW_S009.description: Offers advice based on his experiences as a cursed being.

the-sprite.name: The Sprite
the-sprite.description: A sprite who knows the secrets of the forest and offers help — for a price.

TS_A001.title: Disappearing Act
TS_A001.description: Vanishes from sight to avoid danger.

TS_A003.title: Shadow Step
TS_A003.description: Moves swiftly through the shadows, unseen.

TS_A004.title: Misdirection
TS_A004.description: Distracts enemies to create an opening.

TS_A005.title: Ultimate Gambit
TS_A005.description: Takes a risky action with the potential for great reward.

TS_A007.title: Stolen Shadow
TS_A007.description: Steals the shadow of an enemy, weakening them.

TS_A008.title: Flicker Strike
TS_A008.description: Strikes quickly, disappearing before the enemy can react.

TS_A009.title: Mirage
TS_A009.description: Creates a mirage to mislead foes.

TS_A010.title: Disappearing Act
TS_A010.description: Vanishes from sight to avoid danger.

TS_S001.description: Shares hidden knowledge to sway decisions.

TS_S002.title: Mischief Managed
TS_S002.description: Uses charm and wit to manipulate outcomes.

TS_S003.title: Sprite's Promise
TS_S003.description: Promises something in exchange for cooperation.

TS_S004.title: Veiled Threat
TS_S004.description: Hints at danger if things don't go the Sprite's way.

TS_S005.title: Playful Banter
TS_S005.description: Engages in light-hearted banter to ease tension.

TS_S006.title: Subtle Persuasion
TS_S006.description: Uses subtlety to nudge others towards agreement.

TS_S007.title: Mystic Riddle
TS_S007.description: Poses a riddle that challenges the mind.

TS_S008.title: Feigning Innocence
TS_S008.description: Pretends to be innocent to gain sympathy.

TS_S009.title: Shadowed Intent
TS_S009.description: Hints at hidden motives behind the Sprite's actions.

the-dark-sorcerer.name: The Dark Sorcerer
the-dark-sorcerer.description: A powerful sorcerer who has cast a dark curse over the Enchanted Forest, seeking to corrupt its magic for his own gain. His presence spreads fear and despair, and he will stop at nothing to achieve his twisted goals.

DS_A001.title: Curse of Shadows
DS_A001.description: Casts a shadowy curse that weakens enemies.

DS_A002.title: Dark Bolt
DS_A002.description: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy that harms and corrupts.

DS_A003.title: Summon Minions
DS_A003.description: Calls forth dark creatures to assist in battle.

DS_A004.title: Necrotic Touch
DS_A004.description: Drains life from the target, transferring it to the Dark Sorcerer.

DS_A005.title: Fear Manifestation
DS_A005.description: Manifests the target's worst fears, causing panic.

DS_A006.title: Dark Shield
DS_A006.description: Creates a barrier of dark magic that absorbs damage.

DS_A007.title: Corrupting Mist
DS_A007.description: Spreads a mist that slowly corrupts those within it.

DS_A008.title: Soul Rend
DS_A008.description: Tears at the soul of the target, causing deep spiritual harm.

DS_A009.title: Arcane Devastation
DS_A009.description: Unleashes a powerful arcane blast that damages everything in its path.

DS_A010.title: Curse of Shadows
DS_A010.description: Casts a shadowy curse that weakens enemies.

DS_A011.title: Curse of Shadows
DS_A011.description: Casts a shadowy curse that weakens enemies.

DS_A012.description: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy that harms and corrupts.

DS_A013.title: Summon Minions
DS_A013.description: Calls forth dark creatures to assist in battle.

DS_A020.title: Arcane Devastation

DS_S001.title: Dark Bargain
DS_S001.description: Offers a tempting deal, with sinister consequences.

DS_S002.title: Words of Corruption
DS_S002.description: Sows seeds of doubt and corruption in the minds of others.

DS_S004.title: Deceptive Charm
DS_S004.description: Appears unexpectedly charming, hiding dark intentions.

DS_S005.title: Veil of Lies
DS_S005.description: Weaves a web of lies to mislead and confuse.

DS_S006.title: Offer of Power
DS_S006.description: Tempts others with promises of power.

DS_S007.title: Dark Manipulation
DS_S007.description: Subtly twists words to manipulate outcomes.

DS_S008.title: Whispers of Despair
DS_S008.description: Whispers words that sap hope and spread despair.

DS_S009.title: False Promises
DS_S009.description: Makes promises he never intends to keep.

I001.title: Awakening in the Glade
I001.description: The group awakens in a mysterious glade, unsure of how they arrived.

effect.description: If successful, the group gathers their bearings and discovers a clue. Otherwise, the group is disoriented and gets angry at one another.

I002.title: The Lost Path
I002.description: The group stumbles upon a path that seems to shift and change as they walk.

effect.description: If successful, the path leads to a hidden clearing with valuable resources. Otherwise, the group becomes lost, losing valuable time and energy.

I003.title: The Whispering Trees
I003.description: The trees around the group begin to whisper secrets, some true, some false.

effect.description: If successful, the group discerns a vital truth from the whispers. Otherwise, the group is misled by false information.

I004.title: The Gathering Storm
I004.description: A storm begins to gather overhead, threatening to trap the group in the forest.

effect.description: If successful, the group finds shelter and waits out the storm. Otherwise, the group is caught in the storm, suffering from the elements.

I005.title: A Stranger's Warning
I005.description: A mysterious figure appears, warning the group of dangers ahead.

effect.description: If successful, the group heeds the warning and avoids a trap. Otherwise, the group dismisses the warning and falls into danger.

S001.title: The Enchanted River
S001.description: Crossing the Enchanted River is dangerous but necessary.

S002.title: Ambush in the Thicket
S002.description: The group is ambushed by corrupted forest creatures.

S003.title: The Whispering Trees
S003.description: The trees seem to whisper secrets, guiding or deceiving the protagonists.

S004.title: The Dark Sorcerer's Gaze
S004.description: The Dark Sorcerer becomes aware of the group's presence and sends a wave of dark energy.

S005.title: The Hidden Grove
S005.description: A hidden grove offers a brief respite, but it may hold secrets.

S006.title: The Forbidden Ritual
S006.description: The Dark Sorcerer begins a ritual to increase his power. The group must interrupt it to prevent the Dark Sorcerer's strength from increasing.

S007.title: The Forest Guardian's Test
S007.description: The Forest Guardian tests the group's worthiness to continue their journey.

S008.title: The Cursed Clearing
S008.description: A clearing in the forest is tainted by dark magic. The group must purify it.

S009.title: The Troll Bridge
S009.description: The group encounters a bridge guarded by a troll demanding a toll.

S010.title: The Path of Illusions
S010.description: The group must navigate a path filled with illusions designed to mislead them.

S011.title: The Enchanted Stag
S011.description: A majestic stag offers assistance, but only if it is approached correctly.

S012.title: The Moonlit Dance
S012.description: Under the light of the full moon, the group encounters a mysterious figure who offers a dance with fate.

effect.description: Protagonists must use social cards to determine the outcome of the dance. Success provides valuable insight.

S013.title: The Ancient Tree
S013.description: The player discovers the Ancient Tree, which holds the key to breaking the curse.

S014.title: The Mystic Waters
S014.description: The group finds a pool of mystic waters that could heal or harm.

S015.title: The Final Decision
S015.description: The group must make a critical decision that will determine the fate of the forest.

S016.title: The Enchanted River
S016.description: Crossing the Enchanted River is dangerous but necessary.

S017.title: Ambush in the Thicket
S017.description: The group is ambushed by corrupted forest creatures.

S018.title: The Dark Sorcerer's Gaze
S018.description: The Dark Sorcerer becomes aware of the group's presence and sends a wave of dark energy.

effect.description: Protagonists must defend themselves using action cards. Failure results in severe consequences.

S019.title: The Whispering Trees
S019.description: The trees seem to whisper secrets, guiding or deceiving the protagonists.

S020.title: The Final Confrontation
S020.description: The group finally confronts the Dark Sorcerer in a battle for the forest's fate.

S021.title: The Hidden Enemy
S021.description: An unseen enemy stalks the group, ready to strike.

S022.title: The Path of Illusions
S022.description: The group must navigate a path filled with illusions designed to mislead them.

S023.title: The Forbidden Ritual
S023.description: The Dark Sorcerer begins a ritual to increase his power. The group must interrupt it.

S024.title: The Mystic Waters
S024.description: The group finds a pool of mystic waters that could heal or harm.

effect.description: Protagonists must decide whether to drink the waters, using their social cards to influence the outcome.

S025.title: The Ancient Tree
S025.description: The player discovers the Ancient Tree, which holds the key to breaking the curse.

S026.title: The Hidden Grove
S026.description: A hidden grove offers a brief respite, but it may hold secrets.

S027.title: The Enchanted Stag
S027.description: A majestic stag offers assistance, but only if it is approached correctly.

S028.title: The Moonlit Dance
S028.description: Under the light of the full moon, the group encounters a mysterious figure who offers a dance with fate.

S029.title: The Final Confrontation
S029.description: The group finally confronts the Dark Sorcerer in a battle for the forest's fate.

S030.title: The Forest Guardian's Test
S030.description: The Forest Guardian tests the group's worthiness to continue their journey.
